response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds an intrinsic value of $1,500,000 to you, based on your unique needs and requirements. I am extending to you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its unparalleled quality and the significant value it will bring to you. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing how we can make this acquisition a reality.", "product_price": 900000}
